title: New or reconnected tabs are always placed at the end of the tab strip
author: C4rb0n
body_snippet:
<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->
New or reconnected tabs are placed at the end of the tab strip of the associated panel, regardless of configured preference.  This is a regression introduced in published nightly v1.77.2-nb.

## Expected Behavior
<!--- If you're describing a bug, tell us what should happen -->
<!--- If you're suggesting a change/improvement, tell us how it should work -->

comments.author: simonai1254
comments.snippet: Noticed this as well (and thought I stumbled across this in another issue though couldn't find it anymore), though I was aware of it after a short time and don't have that many tabs open (or enough screen real estate) that it didn't bother me too much. Independently I would support it to get this resolved.

comments.author: nelgin
comments.snippet: I am going to +1 to get this fixed as soon as possible. It's very annoying behavior. I open a lot of tabs and in a specific order so I know which is which easily, I can have 12 or more tabs open. If I get disconnected from any one of those servers and I reconnect, the tab is placed at the end and I have to move it back. For a server with 5 connections, this disrupts my workflow.
